docs.text:
Roaming Gamer Docs








Product Types














Almost all my products require SSK2. 
Get It Now!






Starters


Focused examinations of game and app mechanics.






Kernels


Even smaller than starters, usually free, but no docs except in the code.






Templates


Complete games and applications, ready to modify and/or reskin.






Plugins


Feature specific libraries/modules distributed through the Corona plugin system.






Tools


Complete solutions to common Corona SDK game and app design problems.






AskEd


My answers to your questions in the 
Corona Forums
.






Free Stuff


As of last count, hundreds of projects, containing 624 Lua files and over 66,368 lines of code.








Starters




Starters
 are "focused examinations of game and app mechanics," with these primary goals:






Provide a way (for you) to examine and understand how specific mechanics are implemented.


Give you a working piece of code to extend and expand to suit your own needs.


Keep game and app development simple and fun.










Product


Description












SUPERCHARGING 
Corona SDK
 game development every day.  
Get It Now!






Action Pack #1


One basic template and five game starters: 'Flappy Bird', 'Escape', 'Bouncing Ball 2', 'Flappy Color', and 'Circle'.






Ideas ...


A big list of starters ideas.  See a cool idea?  
Ask for it in the forums








Starters In Progress








Product


Description










Slots


A slot machines starter kit. (
Almost Done
)






Action Pack #2


Similar to pack #1, but examining vertical style one-touch action games.










Kernels




Kernels
 are 
FREE
 micro-
Starters
, that require 
.




Note: All kernels are located in the 
~/RG_FreeStuff/SSK2/kernels/
 my free Git:


https://github.com/roaminggamer/RG_FreeStuff
  


(
The best way to get these is to download the entire repository.
)








Kernel (Path)


Description










input_Easy/








001_easyInputs


A sampler showing how to use each of the 
easyInputs
 input helpers.






movements_General/








001_actionMovements


A sampler showing movements using the 
ssk.actions
 library.






002_basicMovements


A sampler showing basic player/enemy movements using pure physics implementations.






003_gameMovements


A sampler showing game player movements for the games 
Red 
 Dead 1
, Asteroids, and Lunar Lander.






movements_Player/








001_asteroids_movement


Asteroids movement and screen wrapping.






002_lunar_lander_two_touch


Lunar lander movement using 
twoTouch
 
ssk.easyInputs
 helper.






003_lunar_lander_three_input


Lunar lander movement using two buttons to turn and a throttle input.






004_geometry_wars_re_movement


'Geometry Wars: Retro Evolved'-like player movement.






005_robotron_movement


Robotron-like input and movement.






006_xevious_movement


Xevious like movement.






007_endless_vertical


Endless vertical movement.






008_endless_horizontal


Endless horizontal movement.






009_escape_ketchapp


Escape-like movement.






010_rad_flyer


Red 
 Dead 1
 movement modifications experiment.






011_rad_tunnel_flyer


Red 
 Dead 1
 movement refined.






012_jelly_fish


Jellyfish movement?  Joystick to steer.  Tap right side of screen to 'thrust'.  Uses 
ssk.easyInputs
 helper.






weapons/








001_rotating_turret


Basic turret that auto rotates left-right-left and fires when you click the screen.






002_aiming_turret


Basic aiming turret that uses uses SSK2 
facing
 to aim-at/face target.






003_seeking_projectile


This turret fires 'seeking projectiles' with a limited lifetime.  Uses 
ssk.actions
 library.










Templates


Templates
 are "complete games and applications," designed for you to learn from and to create with these primary goals:




Provide a starting point for you to make your own games and apps by reskinning.


Provide a starting point for you to expand and extend the game/app concept.


Keep game and app development simple and fun.




I am currently updating my existing templates as well as adding new ones.








Starter


Description










Tic-Tac-Toe


Coming soon ...






Pig


Coming soon ...






Sudoku


Coming soon ...






Jigsaw Puzzle


Coming soon ...






Sliding Puzzle


Coming soon ...






Gear Jumper


Coming soon ...






Roids!


Coming soon ...






Slot Machines


Coming soon ...






More


Coming soon ...










Plugins


Plugins
 are libraries/modules distributed through the Corona plugin system.








Plugin


Description










Math 2D


Highly functional, flexible, and fast 2D Math module.






Sudoku Generator


Sudoku data generator for 2x2, 3x3, and 4x4 puzzles.










Tools


Tools
(tools) are complete solutions to common Corona SDK game and app design problems.




All tools require 
 - 
Get It Here!




I am currently updating my existing tools as well as adding new ones.








Starter


Description










EAT Lite


Coming soon ...

Coming soon ...






Particle Editor 2


Coming soon ...






RG Super Meter 3


Coming soon ...






Event Reflector


Coming soon ...






More


Coming soon ...








Ideas


Starter Ideas


This is my big list of 
Starter
  ideas. I think it would be fun to make starters for these.  If you see something on the list that looks cool to you, let me know by 
Requesting Something
.




 - Means it has been written.

 
 
 - Means it has been released (look above).

Automated Doors

Requesting Something


Do you have a cool idea?  Am I missing a product that is critical to your game or app?


Whatever the case, you can ask me to make it 
HERE
.  Just make a post with these details:




Title
 - Roaming Gamer: Can You Make XYZ?


Body
 - Describe the thing you want me to make.  Try to be as clear as possible.




I will respond as soon as I see the post and we will proceed from there.  


Thank You!




  Copyright 
 Roaming Gamer, LLC. 2008-2016; All Rights Reserved
